children.name: Example
children.text: var handler = new sn_sms_pref.SMSPreferenceHandler('TwilioDirect'); // Pass the provider name var config = handler.getConfig();

children.name: provider
children.text2: Name of the telephony service provider.

children.name: SMSPreferenceHandler(String provider)
children.text: Instantiates the SMSPreferenceHandler script include object.

children.name: Example
children.text: var handler = new sn_sms_pref.SMSPreferenceHandler('TwilioDirect'); // Pass the provider name var config = handler.getConfig();

children.name: GlideRecord
children.text:
Preference configuration record for the current telephony service provider. If
                no record exists, then null.

children.name: getConfig()
children.text:
Returns the preferences configuration record for the current telephony service
    provider.
children.text2: The method queries all preference configuration records from the SMS Preference Configuration [sn_sms_pref_configuration] table for the current telephony service provider, sorts the results by the Order field (lowest to highest), and then returns the first record.

name: SMSPreferenceHandler - Scoped, Global
text: The SMSPreferenceHandler API provides methods to manage SMS configurations.
text2: This API is implemented as the script include SMSPreferenceHandlerSNC and resides in the sn_sms_pref namespace. To use this API you must install the Notify plugin (com.snc.notify) which requires a separate subscription. You can activate this plugin if you have the admin role.
